institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Ministry of Employment and Labor's Consignment Project Subsidy Processing Rules/Article 4 (Preparation of Expenditure Resolution)
contents: Article 4 (Preparation of Expenditure Resolution) When depositing support funds into a firm banking account in accordance with Article 3, Paragraph 1, the fund disbursement officer must prepare a disbursement resolution in Form No. 13 of the 「Enforcement Rules of the National Treasury Management Act」.
